bugs.summary: Move crashtests under editor/ to editing/crashtests
Clean up reshaping for shape teleporting
Add "mozalloc_abort" crash reason to distinguish mozalloc_abort() and bare MOZ_CRASH() crashes
sway is not recognised as a desktop environment in about:support
Context menu and other popups open 4px to the right
Stop using the second argument to ChromeUtils.import in password manager tests
Add a menu "Move PiP Toggle to Left(Right)" in context menu for the PiP toggle button
